title: | Video | Heartbreak for Ishant Sharma and Irfan Pathan at IPL 2017 auction | Sports Videos | - India Today
text:
Heartbreak for Ishant Sharma and Irfan Pathan at IPL 2017 auction India Today Television | February 21, 2017 Next Video UP polls: Stage collapses ahead of Akhilesh, Rahul address in Allahabad Embed Feedback 
Ben Stokes may have fetched a record price at the Indian Premier League 2017 auction but the clamour to sign uncapped Indian talent showed the franchises have been diligent with their homework. It was a heartbreak for Ishant Sharma, Irfan Pathan and Cheteshwar Pujara fans as they remained unsold even as the Indian rookies fetched hefty sums of money. Infact, it was a reality check for the IPL stalwarts. Watch Right Now
